movie = series of combos

byetudlr axlrPNNN [nnnnnnnn]

if P clear:
	combo is 2 bytes
	NNN = (number of frames - 1) combo is held
	nnnnnnnn doesn't exist
if P set:
	combo is 3 bytes
	NNN = unused
	nnnnnnnn = (number of frames - 1) combo is held
	

+00-01 = 16-bit ptr into movie
+02    = 8-bit counter into combo
+03-42 = movie header
			+03    = movie version
			+04    = translevel
			+05-06 = length of movie minus header in bytes
			+07-09 = author name
			+13-16 = switches
			+17    = special effects
			+18    = mario's powerup
			+19    = mario's item box
			+1A    = yoshi's color
			+23-26 = boo ring angles
			+27-28 = global frames
+43+   = movie

YI3	

FoI1
